reviews.review: Jogo lendário! Feito para quem curte uma ótima experiência FPS multiplayer. Leve, casual, competitivo. Simplesmente o melhor!
no cheating then a good game, beautiful gun for collection

Great game! Very fun MMO that has had it's ups and downs. Great variety of game modes that are perfect for chilling on a nice day or going tryhard in a competitive scene.

Minhas notas na faculdade diminuíram consideravelmente após me apresentarem esse game, briguei com minha família, desfiz amizades após me tornar mais violento devido a colegas de time que não pertencem ao mesmo país, vulgo boludos, não seguir a porra de uma simples call e só rushar B ou dar TK. 
Muito bom, recomendo pra todos.

fast paced, social, fast reaction time

The best game and the worst game you will ever play. One game you'll get matched with 4 people that you have instant chemistry with against 5 people with aim that will make you think they have a severe case or parkinsons. The next game you will get matched against a smurf and get shit on in ways that make you question your existence and, your team will have a combined iq of about 45 with you keeping it from going below 30. You better buckle up and get ready to ream or be reamed.
let's go felas, meu jogo preferido
